summary: Oxycodone is a strong pain-relieving medicine, often known by the brand names Roxicodone or OxyContin (the long-acting version). It is made from a substance found in the opium poppy. This drug is very effective for severe pain but can be highly addictive and is often misused. Common side effects include feeling happy (euphoria), sleepiness, and constipation. It can also cause serious problems like addiction, depression, and breathing issues. Oxycodone has been used since 1917 and is an important medicine worldwide.
title: Oxycodone
